goal.en: "This course is the capstone course of the department of Economics and aims to help students who take this course seriously can meet the requirements of the Learning Goals of Management School. Students who take this course must give an oral presentation (with 28 ~ 32 pages of PPT, at least 4 pages containing tables or figures of numerical data) and submit a term paper (2,400 ~ 3,000 words). The themes of the oral presentation and the term paper lie in the following Learning Goals: Global Perspective, Sustainable Development and Management Knowledge."
goal.ch: "本課程為經濟系的總整課程，其教學目標在於協助認真修課的同學能符合管院「學習目標 (learning goals)」的要求。修課同學須上台進行一篇「口語報告」(PPT頁數為28 ~ 32 頁，其中至少 4 頁為數值資料的圖或表)，以及一篇期末報告 (2,400 ~ 3,000字)。這兩篇報告的主題須從國際觀、永續發展與管理知識這三項學習目標中擇二。另外，還有一篇第三個學習目標的學習心得報告 (600 ~ 1,000字)。"
